text.div:
Condition Clinical Status Codes

Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-clinical defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
active ActiveThe subject is currently experiencing the symptoms of the condition.
relapse RelapseThe subject is re-experiencing the symptoms of the condition after a period of remission or presumed resolution.
remission RemissionThe subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition, but there is a risk of the symptoms returning.
resolved ResolvedThe subject is no longer experiencing the symptoms of the condition and there is no perceived risk of the symptoms returning.
